price: 39. Ô peuple mien, la vie en ce bas monde n’est que jouissance passagère. Mais l’autre monde est, lui, la demeure permanente.
arabic: يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنَّمَا هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا مَتَٰعٞ وَإِنَّ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ هِيَ دَارُ ٱلۡقَرَارِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yāqawmi innamā hādhihi al-ḥayatu al-dun'yā matāʿun wa-inna al-ākhirata hiya dāru al-qarāri
